posts.author: PierceThyBody
posts.content:
Hey there!

I'm looking for a good build for a new drow character that I'm looking to start pretty soon here, so the earlier the response the better.

As its been said in many of the other build requests for Arelithian characters, there are "gifts" available for use. I wouldn't mind using /one/ of these gifts.

The drow subrace gives you: DEX +2, CON -2, INT +2, CHA +2 Darkvision Spell Resistance: 11+level (capped at 32)Spell-Like Ability: Darkness 1/day Favored Class: Cleric (female) or Wizard (male) ELC +2 upon creation. I would also prefer to have my character mainly use a katana, although I will settle for kamas or rapiers.

The rule for the three level progression minimum still stands and since my character is a drow female that is NOT a priestess, I'll need her playable all the way through. Especially considering level progression is slow. I would prefer to not use any 'special' classes, but I would he open to it if its highly recommended.

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Here's some ideas:
Rogue 16 / Monk 16 / CoT 8 - DEX-based - dual Kamas - Lawful Neutral or Lawful Good
Rogue 19 / Monk 17 / Blackguard 4 - DEX-based - dual Kamas - Lawful Evil
Fighter 18 / Weapon Master 22 - STR-based - Katana - Any Alignment
Fighter 8 / Weapon Master 22 / CoT 10 - STR-based - Katana - Non-Evil
Fighter 10 / Weapon Master 22 / Blackguard 8 - STR-based - Katana - Evil
Rogue 20 / Fighter 20 - DEX-based - Rapier - Any Alignment
Rogue 30 / CoT 10 - DEX-based -Rapier - Non-Evil
Rogue 20 / Blackguard 20 - DEX-based - Rapier - Evil

If any of those appeal to you, I'll build it for you.

posts.author: PierceThyBody
posts.content:
The second, third, and fifth appeal to me most, but the level cap for Arelith is 30, and all of these go up to 40.
Which would be best as a combination of PvP and PvM at level 30?
I'm able to get items to have a max of +12 to any ability score, as I'm sure that would make a difference.

Thanks!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content:
Oops! I forgot about the level 30 limit.

So, here are 30-level versions of the ones you picked:
Rogue 13 / Monk 12 / Blackguard 5
Fighter 14 / Weapon Master 16
Fighter 16 / Weapon Master 7 / Blackguard 7

I'll build them for you this evening.

posts.author: PierceThyBody
posts.content:
Looking forward to it.

Thanks for taking the time, Empyre. :]
